sentences.en: Green Grams ovary consists singe carpel, one locule, cantaining 9 - 13 campylotropous ovules bearing at the marginal placentation.
sentences.cn: 绿豆子厉由单心皮构成, 1室,有9—13个弯生胚珠着生在边缘胎座上.

sentences.en: Heat not a furnace for your foe so hot that it do singe yourself.
sentences.cn: 不要为你的敌人把炉火烧的太热,以致烫伤自己.

sentences.en: If the iron is too hot you'll singe that nightdress.
sentences.cn: 如果熨斗过热,你会把睡衣烫焦.

sentences.en: Love is blinding, an eternity a singe moment, a religion worth dying for and time consuming.
sentences.cn: 爱是盲目的, 是瞬间的永恒, 是种值得为之牺牲的信念.

sentences.en: Results Side - effect of combination group was obviously lower than that of singe chemotherapy group.
sentences.cn: 结果联合组的化疗后毒副作用较化疗组明显减轻.

sentences.en: The electric fire had begun to singe the bottoms of his trousers.
sentences.cn: 电暖炉的火刚开始烧着他的裤腿。

sentences.en: The flames had singed her hair.
The iron's too hot, you'll singe the dress.
sentences.cn: 熨斗太热了, 你会把衣服烫焦的.

sentences.en: Then it might singe the backsides of some of those snotty - nosed shufflers in Parliament.
sentences.cn: 那样也许可以把国会里一些卑鄙的 两面派 的屁股烧它一下.

sentences.en: Toast the dried chillies in a hot pan until they start to singe.
sentences.cn: 将干辣椒放在烧热的平底锅里煸至微焦。

sentences.en: With adjustable wallboard length, thickness and manufacturing speed, it is available for singe - layer or multi - layer manufacturing.
sentences.cn: 墙板宽度 、 厚度、生产速度均可调, 单层 生产也可重叠式生产.

trans.tran_en: a mark on the surface of something where it has been burnt slightly
to burn the surface of something slightly, or to be burned slightly
